original: 'di ltar / dran pa yin ni rang bzhin la //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dran pa yin ni rang bzhin la //
translated: Thus:

original: de nyid du na zhig med pa //
analyzed: de nyid du na zhig med pa //
translated: If it is memory, it does not exist in reality.

original: de tshe mthong ba'i rang bzhin ni //üîΩzhig go zhes bya bab chol yin //
analyzed: de tshe mthong ba'i rang bzhin ni // zhig go zhes bya bab chol yin //
translated: If it is the nature of seeing,üîΩit is nonsense to say that it is destroyed.

original: zhig pa zhes bya ba ni med pa nyid la brjod do //
analyzed: zhig pa zhes bya ba ni med pa nyid la brjod do //
translated: ‚Äú Destruction‚Äù is said to be nonexistence.

original: yod pa'i gnas skabs ni med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa'i gnas skabs ni med pa ma yin no //
translated: The state of existence is not nonexistence.

original: med pa'i gnas skabs na yang de nyid med pa'i phyir ci ltar de'i med pa yin /üîΩde'i phyir dngos po med par tha dad par smra ba la med do zhes gzhi mthun pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med pa'i gnas skabs na yang de nyid med pa'i phyir ci ltar de'i med pa yin / de'i phyir dngos po med par tha dad par smra ba la med do zhes gzhi mthun pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: And when it is in the state of nonexistence, it is not that, because it does not exist.üîΩTherefore, in the case of the assertion of a difference between nonexistence and existence, there is no common locus for the two, ‚Äúnonexistent‚Äù and ‚Äúexistent.‚Äù

original: des na dngos po med pa na dngos po la gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir gzhi mthun par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na dngos po med pa na dngos po la gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir gzhi mthun par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since nonexistence is not different from existence, there is a common locus for the two.

original: phyis 'byung ba'i dngos po med pa ni 'di nyid yin @277a * //
analyzed: phyis 'byung ba'i dngos po med pa ni 'di nyid yin @277a * //
translated: The nonexistence of a later thing is just that.

original: te ; de las ldog pa dang ldan pa'i snga ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: te ; de las ldog pa dang ldan pa'i snga ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the prior thing that possesses the cessation of that.

original: phyi ma mi dmigs pa yang de dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: phyi ma mi dmigs pa yang de dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The nonapprehension of the later thing is the apprehension of that.

original: de yang da ltar ba'i rang bzhin gyi gzung ba 'dzin pa'i mngon sum gyi rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: de yang da ltar ba'i rang bzhin gyi gzung ba 'dzin pa'i mngon sum gyi rang bzhin yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is the nature of direct perception that apprehends the present object.

original: phyi ma dang lhan cig 'byor par 'dzin na ni 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa gzung bar thal lo zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: phyi ma dang lhan cig 'byor par 'dzin na ni 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa gzung bar thal lo zhes bstan zin to //
translated: If it apprehends in conjunction with the future, then it would follow that it would apprehend up to the end of death.

original: des na gzhan dang ma 'byor par rtogs pa skyes pa tsam las grub pa gzhan la mi ltos so //
analyzed: des na gzhan dang ma 'byor par rtogs pa skyes pa tsam las grub pa gzhan la mi ltos so //
translated: Therefore, it is established that it is merely the arising of the cognition that does not depend on anything else.

original: gang gis ltos nas 'jig pa de lta bu de ni de'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis ltos nas 'jig pa de lta bu de ni de'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is dependent, then that which is dependent is not its intrinsic nature.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: In response to this, it is said:

original: gal te dngos po khyab min na ;
analyzed: gal te dngos po khyab min na ;
translated: If things do not pervade,

original: / ci yi don du gzhan la ltos //
analyzed: / ci yi don du gzhan la ltos //
translated: for what purpose would they depend on another?

original: 'on te dngos rang khyab nyid na //
analyzed: 'on te dngos rang khyab nyid na //
translated: But if things do pervade,

original: de la ltos pa don med nyid //
analyzed: de la ltos pa don med nyid //
translated: then dependence on another is meaningless.

original: ces 'di ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: ces 'di ni bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: ltos med dngos po nam yang ni //
analyzed: ltos med dngos po nam yang ni //
translated: A thing that does not depend on another

original: de lta min par ci ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: de lta min par ci ltar 'gyur //
translated: how could it ever be otherwise?

original: dper na de nyid 'jig ka mar //
analyzed: dper na de nyid 'jig ka mar //
translated: For example, just as

original: ltos la brten par mi 'dod bzhin //
analyzed: ltos la brten par mi 'dod bzhin //
translated: one does not assert that it depends on another at the time of destruction.

original: dang po kho nar mngon sum gyis chad pa nyid du mthong ba na 'ga' zhig gi tshe yang de lta ma yin na ci ltar 'gyur te dper na rtag par smra ba de nyid 'jig pa'i gnas skabs su gyur pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dang po kho nar mngon sum gyis chad pa nyid du mthong ba na 'ga' zhig gi tshe yang de lta ma yin na ci ltar 'gyur te dper na rtag par smra ba de nyid 'jig pa'i gnas skabs su gyur pa bzhin no //
translated: If it is seen to be terminated by direct perception from the very beginning, then how could it be otherwise at any time? For example, it is like the proponent of permanence when the occasion of destruction has occurred.

original: ltos pa med pa skad cig kyang //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa skad cig kyang //
translated: If you say that even a momentary thing

original: dngos po yod mi 'gyur zhe na ;
analyzed: dngos po yod mi 'gyur zhe na ;
translated: does not exist without dependence,

original: / gal te dngos po 'jig pa la ltos pa med pa nyid yin na skad cig tsam yang ltos pa yod pa ma yin pas na /
analyzed: / gal te dngos po 'jig pa la ltos pa med pa nyid yin na skad cig tsam yang ltos pa yod pa ma yin pas na /
translated: if a thing does not depend on destruction, then it does not exist even for a moment, since it does not exist in dependence.

original: skad cig kyang dngos po yod pa'i skabs med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skad cig kyang dngos po yod pa'i skabs med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus there is no occasion for the existence of a thing even for a moment.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: As it is said:

original: rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir //
analyzed: rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir //
translated: Because it does not depend on another cause,

original: rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur //üîΩzhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur // zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: it would be either permanent or nonexistent.

original: des na dngos po mtshan nyid kyi de ma thag tu 'jig par 'byung ba ci ltar de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: des na dngos po mtshan nyid kyi de ma thag tu 'jig par 'byung ba ci ltar de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur /
translated: Thus, how could a thing that arises immediately after its characteristics be of its nature?

original: de'i bdag nyid ma yin na yang gzhi'i mthun pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ma yin na yang gzhi'i mthun pa med do zhe na /
translated: If it is not of its nature, then there is no basis for its similarity.

original: de yang rtsba  ka sha ka ku sha la 'ju ba yin te /
analyzed: de yang rtsba  ka sha ka ku sha la 'ju ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, the word ‚Äúdestruction‚Äù is used for the cutting of grass, the cutting of reeds, and the cutting of kusha grass.

original: de ltar gyur na de dngos yin //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na de dngos yin //
translated: If that were so, then it would be a thing.

original: dngos med de ltar ci ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos med de ltar ci ltar 'gyur //
translated: How could a non-thing be like that?

original: 'jig pa ni dngos po phyi ma dang / ma byon dngos po nyid yin pas dngos po nyid yod pa ma yin na de ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'jig pa ni dngos po phyi ma dang / ma byon dngos po nyid yin pas dngos po nyid yod pa ma yin na de ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: Since destruction is a future thing and a non-arisen thing, if it does not exist, how could it be like that?

original: de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa yin la de med par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa yin la de med par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi 'thad do //
translated: It is not tenable to say that it would be that way, but it would not exist.

original: de lta na /
analyzed: de lta na /
translated: If that is so,

original: 'o na 'jig pa med pas na /
analyzed: 'o na 'jig pa med pas na /
translated: then since destruction does not exist,

original: @277b 'jig pa dang mi ldan par 'jig pa can du ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: @277b 'jig pa dang mi ldan par 'jig pa can du ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how could that which possesses destruction be without destruction?

original: 'jig pa tha dad pa yod kyang rang gi ngo bo las 'phos pa med pas ji ltar 'jig pa yin /
analyzed: 'jig pa tha dad pa yod kyang rang gi ngo bo las 'phos pa med pas ji ltar 'jig pa yin /
translated: Even if destruction exists separately, since it does not move from its own nature, how could it be destroyed?

original: 'jig pa'i bdag nyid kyi tha dad de nyid 'pho ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig pa'i bdag nyid kyi tha dad de nyid 'pho ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the very difference that is the nature of destruction moves,

original: yin la rag mod de lta na yang /
analyzed: yin la rag mod de lta na yang /
translated: that may be so, but

original: tha dad pa nyid du rtogs pa'i yul du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid du rtogs pa'i yul du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: since it would be the object of the understanding of difference, it would not be a non-thing.

original: dngos po snga ma kho na bzhin du dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po snga ma kho na bzhin du dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be perceived just as it was before.

original: tha dad pa'i tha dad pa ni 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i tha dad pa ni 'di nyid yin te /
translated: The difference between the two is just this:

original: gzhan gyi rang bzhin 'phrog par byed pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rang bzhin 'phrog par byed pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: the former does not take on the nature of the other.

original: 'gal bas 'jig pa zin pa nyid do /
analyzed: 'gal bas 'jig pa zin pa nyid do /
translated: It is destroyed by contradiction,

original: 'jig pa med na 'gal bar mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig pa med na 'gal bar mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if there were no destruction, contradiction would not be established.üîΩTherefore,

original: de'i phyir / gang dag de yod gzhan ltos med //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gang dag de yod gzhan ltos med //
translated: Those that exist without depending on another

original: de dag de yod la nges yin //
analyzed: de dag de yod la nges yin //
translated: are ascertained to exist when that exists.üîΩLike a collection that lacks

original: 'bras bu yi la gegs byed pa //üîΩmed pa can gyi tshogs pa bzhin //
analyzed: 'bras bu yi la gegs byed pa // med pa can gyi tshogs pa bzhin //
translated: an effect that obstructs.

original: dper na gang gis byed pa srid pa dang bral ba'i rgyu tshogs pa tha ma rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa la 'gal ba la yang ltos pa med pas de la nges pa de bzhin du dngos po yang 'jig pa ltos pa med de /
analyzed: dper na gang gis byed pa srid pa dang bral ba'i rgyu tshogs pa tha ma rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa la 'gal ba la yang ltos pa med pas de la nges pa de bzhin du dngos po yang 'jig pa ltos pa med de /
translated: For example, the final collection of causes that is devoid of the possibility of activity is not dependent on contradiction in order to produce its own effect, and it is ascertained in that way.

original: dngos po 'jig pa ltos pa med pa'i phyir skad cig ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po 'jig pa ltos pa med pa'i phyir skad cig ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, things are destroyed without dependence, because things are destroyed without dependence.

original: ltos pa dang bcas pa yin na /
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pa yin na /
translated: If they were dependent,

original: gdon mi za bar 'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar 'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not that it will certainly be destroyed.

original: skyes pa'i phyir 'jig pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: skyes pa'i phyir 'jig pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is destroyed because it has arisen,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no connection.

original: 'brel pa med pa'i ni gtan tshigs bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i ni gtan tshigs bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: A reason that is not connected does not prove the probandum.

original: 'jig pa rgyu med nyid yin na //
analyzed: 'jig pa rgyu med nyid yin na //
translated: If destruction is causeless,

original: de bdag bsgrub bya sgrub byed nyid //
analyzed: de bdag bsgrub bya sgrub byed nyid //
translated: then it is not a reason that proves the probandum.

original: phyis 'byung phyir na bsgrub bya ni //
analyzed: phyis 'byung phyir na bsgrub bya ni //
translated: Because it arises later,

original: rgyu nyid du ni rigs ma yin //üîΩphyis 'byung ba'i 'jig pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu nyid du ni rigs ma yin // phyis 'byung ba'i 'jig pa ni /
translated: it is not tenable that it is a cause.üîΩIt is not tenable that later arising destruction

original: sngar byung ba'i skye ba dang ldan pa'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur bar 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sngar byung ba'i skye ba dang ldan pa'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur bar 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: is a cause that possesses earlier arising arising.

original: 'bras bu ni rgyu las gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdes na de rgyu nyid kyis ni //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni rgyu las gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro // des na de rgyu nyid kyis ni //
translated: Because an effect does not necessarily arise from a cause.

original: gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a reasonüîΩthat proves the probandum by being its cause.üîΩIf it is causeless, then it would be its nature.

original: gal te rgyu med pa yin na ni de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ga las 'jig pa rgyu med pa nyid kyang ji ltar yin te /
analyzed: gal te rgyu med pa yin na ni de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ga las 'jig pa rgyu med pa nyid kyang ji ltar yin te /
translated: How could destruction be causeless?

original: thob pa la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ldog gi rjes su byed pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu'i chos kyang de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: thob pa la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ldog gi rjes su byed pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu'i chos kyang de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is the cause of the subsequent non-existence of the thing, and because the effect of the thing is just that much.

original: 'di la brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa /
translated: To this we reply:

original: dngos po phyis @278a * //üîΩ'brel med pa yi //
analyzed: dngos po phyis @278a * // 'brel med pa yi //
translated: The thing that is laterüîΩwithout a connection with the thing

original: bdag can dngos po med 'jig na //
analyzed: bdag can dngos po med 'jig na //
translated: that has been destroyed,

original: der ni sngar yang mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: der ni sngar yang mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: is seen as it was before.

original: ci ltar 'jig byed rgyu can yin //
analyzed: ci ltar 'jig byed rgyu can yin //
translated: How can it be the cause of destruction?

original: gang zhig gang med par yang mthong ba de ci ltar de'i rgyu can yin /
analyzed: gang zhig gang med par yang mthong ba de ci ltar de'i rgyu can yin /
translated: How can that which is seen to exist even when this does not exist be the cause of that?

original: rjes su 'gro ba tsam gyi rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni lan cig ma yin par bstan zin to //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba tsam gyi rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni lan cig ma yin par bstan zin to //
translated: We have already explained more than once that a cause is not merely a concomitant.

original: ci ltar 'jig par byed pa nye bas gyo ma la sogs par gyur pa na bum pa phyi ma dang 'brel pa med par rtogs pa de bzhin du skyes ma thag par yang yin no //
analyzed: ci ltar 'jig par byed pa nye bas gyo ma la sogs par gyur pa na bum pa phyi ma dang 'brel pa med par rtogs pa de bzhin du skyes ma thag par yang yin no //
translated: Just as when the cause of destruction is present, the pot, etc. are seen to be without a connection with the subsequent pot, so it is with that which has just come into existence.

original: sngar yang phyi ma'i rang bzhin dang 'byor pa ni rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sngar yang phyi ma'i rang bzhin dang 'byor pa ni rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the case that the prior thing is seen to be without a connection with the subsequent thing.

original: 'chi ba'i mthar thug par rtogs par thal lo zhes bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i mthar thug par rtogs par thal lo zhes bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has already been demonstrated that it is the final limit of death.

original: phyis kyang phyi ma dang 'brel pa tsam nyid 'jig pa yin no //
analyzed: phyis kyang phyi ma dang 'brel pa tsam nyid 'jig pa yin no //
translated: And later, it is only the mere connection with the subsequent moment that is the destruction.

original: 'jig pa nyid kyis mi 'byor par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig pa nyid kyis mi 'byor par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: And it is the destruction itself that causes the non-endurance.

original: de ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: de ni mi rung ste /
translated: That is not correct.

original: 'di ltar / mi nus pa dang mi dgos phyir //
analyzed: 'di ltar / mi nus pa dang mi dgos phyir //
translated: Because it is not possible and because it is not necessary,

original: 'jig pa nyid kyis de byas min //üîΩ'byor ni ma 'byor pa la yang //
analyzed: 'jig pa nyid kyis de byas min // 'byor ni ma 'byor pa la yang //
translated: destruction is not made by destruction.üîΩAnd it is not possible for destruction

original: 'jig pa'i nus pa srid ma yin //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i nus pa srid ma yin //
translated: to have the power to destroy that which is not enduring.

original: gal te 'di rgyu las 'byor pa nyid du skyes so zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di rgyu las 'byor pa nyid du skyes so zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is endurance that is produced from a cause,

original: de ltar mngon sum gyis bzung bas na /
analyzed: de ltar mngon sum gyis bzung bas na /
translated: then since that is apprehended by direct perception,

original: der 'jig pa nye bar sbyor ba ci zhig yod de /
analyzed: der 'jig pa nye bar sbyor ba ci zhig yod de /
translated: what is the use of applying destruction to it?

original: de'i tshe ni de'i don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni de'i don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, it would be pointless.

original: 'on te 'di rang gi rgyu la ma 'byor pa nyid du skyes na /
analyzed: 'on te 'di rang gi rgyu la ma 'byor pa nyid du skyes na /
translated: But if it is said that it is non-endurance that is produced from its own cause,

original: de lta yin na 'jig pa don med de /
analyzed: de lta yin na 'jig pa don med de /
translated: then in that case destruction is pointless,

original: byas pa la rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa la rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no cause for what is already produced.

original: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bos skad cig mar gyur pa nyid mngon sum gyis rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bos skad cig mar gyur pa nyid mngon sum gyis rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the fact that it is momentary by virtue of its own nature is realized by direct perception.

original: de lta ma yin na rtogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rtogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were not so, it would be impossible to realize.

original: gang zhig gzhan du rtogs par nus pa de ni gzhan du gyur pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gzhan du rtogs par nus pa de ni gzhan du gyur pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: That which can be realized as something else is not itself something else,

original: gzhan du gyur pa nyid mngon sum gyis gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du gyur pa nyid mngon sum gyis gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the fact that it is something else is contradicted by direct perception.

original: de'i phyir nges pa ni ltos pa med pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa ni ltos pa med pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, certainty is just independence,

original: gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: not something else,

original: rgyu tshogs pa tha ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pa tha ma bzhin no //
translated: like the final collection of causes.

original: gal te nyi ma nub pa dang // 'char ba ltos pa dang bcas pa yin yang gdon mi zar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te nyi ma nub pa dang // 'char ba ltos pa dang bcas pa yin yang gdon mi zar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If the setting and rising of the sun were dependent, would they not be uncertain?

original: ltos pa med pa nyid yin na ni 'char ba dang nub pa'i de ma thag pa de kho nar nub pa dang shar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa nyid yin na ni 'char ba dang nub pa'i de ma thag pa de kho nar nub pa dang shar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If they were independent, then the setting and rising would occur immediately after that, just as they do.

original: tshogs pa yang dngos po med pa la nges pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: tshogs pa yang dngos po med pa la nges pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: A collection is not certain with respect to a nonentity,

original: myu gu la sogs pa don gzhan la yin no //
analyzed: myu gu la sogs pa don gzhan la yin no //
translated: but it is with respect to a different object, such as a sprout.

original: des na dpe des de bzlog pa nyid du @278b 'gyur gyi skabs kyi bsgrub bya sgrub pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na dpe des de bzlog pa nyid du @278b 'gyur gyi skabs kyi bsgrub bya sgrub pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, this example is not a counterexample to our proof.

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: nyi ma nub dang shar ba ni //
analyzed: nyi ma nub dang shar ba ni //
translated: The sun‚Äôs setting and rising

original: shar dang nub pas khyab ma yin //
analyzed: shar dang nub pas khyab ma yin //
translated: are not pervaded by east and west.

original: res 'ga' gzhan du 'ang 'gyur srid do //
analyzed: res 'ga' gzhan du 'ang 'gyur srid do //
translated: Sometimes it is possible that it is otherwise.

original: mi 'gyur ba la tshad ma med //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba la tshad ma med //
translated: But there is no evidence for that.

original: gal te phal cher mthong ba de ltar na yang tshad med pa'i phyir 'char ba dang nub pa dag gis nub pa dang 'char ba'i dngos po dag la ma khyab po //
analyzed: gal te phal cher mthong ba de ltar na yang tshad med pa'i phyir 'char ba dang nub pa dag gis nub pa dang 'char ba'i dngos po dag la ma khyab po //
translated: Even if it is seen to be so for the most part, because there is no evidence, the setting and rising of the sun are not pervaded by the states of setting and rising.

original: 'di ltar bdag po la gus pa la sogs pa'i lo rgyus thos pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag po la gus pa la sogs pa'i lo rgyus thos pa yin no //
translated: For we have heard the story of the respect for the master and so on.üîΩBecause it rises in the latter winter

original: dgun ka phyi mor 'char ba dang // myur bar nub par 'gyur ba'i phyir //üîΩsrid pa'ang yod yin de bzhin du //
analyzed: dgun ka phyi mor 'char ba dang // myur bar nub par 'gyur ba'i phyir // srid pa'ang yod yin de bzhin du //
translated: and sets quickly,üîΩit is possible that it exists.

original: gzhan pa nyid kyang srid pa nyid //
analyzed: gzhan pa nyid kyang srid pa nyid //
translated: In the same way, it is possible that it is otherwise.

original: nub pa ni nyi ma'i ma yin gyi //
analyzed: nub pa ni nyi ma'i ma yin gyi //
translated: The sun does not set,

original: 'on kyang ri la sogs pas bcad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang ri la sogs pas bcad pa yin no //
translated: but it is blocked by mountains and so on.

original: rab tu dpyad pa nyid de yang bdag la ltos pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rab tu dpyad pa nyid de yang bdag la ltos pa yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, that very thorough analysis depends on the self,

original: rnal 'byor pas ni gzhan du yang mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni gzhan du yang mthong ba yin no //
translated: but the yogi sees otherwise.üîΩMoreover, those that are dependent are not necessarily impermanent.

original: gzhan yang ltos pa dang bcas pa rnams ni gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya bar gal te 'ga' zhig gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba yin yang gzhan dag ni de lta ma yin pas the tshom za'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang ltos pa dang bcas pa rnams ni gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya bar gal te 'ga' zhig gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba yin yang gzhan dag ni de lta ma yin pas the tshom za'o //
translated: If something is necessarily impermanent, others doubt that it is not so.

original: tshogs pa tha ma ni dngos po tha dad pa la nges pa yin la /
analyzed: tshogs pa tha ma ni dngos po tha dad pa la nges pa yin la /
translated: The final collection is certain with regard to different things,üîΩbut not with regard to different destructions.

original: 'jig par tha dad par gyur pa la ma yin no zhes gang brjod pa de yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: 'jig par tha dad par gyur pa la ma yin no zhes gang brjod pa de yang mi rung ste /
translated: That which you said is not correct.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / ngo bo gzhan la rang rgyu las //
analyzed: 'di ltar / ngo bo gzhan la rang rgyu las //
translated: The nature of another is from its own cause.

original: nges pa gang des gsal bar ni //
analyzed: nges pa gang des gsal bar ni //
translated: By that certainty, the manifestation

original: rang gi rang bzhin bdag nyid can //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin bdag nyid can //
translated: of its own nature is itself.

original: 'jig pa de ltar cis mi rtogs //
analyzed: 'jig pa de ltar cis mi rtogs //
translated: Why is destruction not understood in that way?

original: 'jig pa zhes bya ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gzhan nyid ni ma yan gyi /
analyzed: 'jig pa zhes bya ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gzhan nyid ni ma yan gyi /
translated: That which is called ‚Äúdestruction‚Äù is not another nature of a non-thing.

original: 'on kyang phyi ma dang 'brel par rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang phyi ma dang 'brel par rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
translated: But it is the nature of the object of the cognition that it is related to the subsequent one.

original: mchi gu'i lus zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis dngos po'i 'jig pa zhes de ltar rtogs pa'i yul du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: mchi gu'i lus zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis dngos po'i 'jig pa zhes de ltar rtogs pa'i yul du gyur pa yin no //
translated: It is the object of the cognition that the thing is destroyed, in the manner of the body of the frog.

original: ci ltar tshogs pa tha ma de myu gu skyed pa'i rang bzhin du nges par dngos po yang de'i phyis kyi dngos po dang 'brel pa med pa'i tha snyad du nges pa yin no zhes ci ste mi 'dod /
analyzed: ci ltar tshogs pa tha ma de myu gu skyed pa'i rang bzhin du nges par dngos po yang de'i phyis kyi dngos po dang 'brel pa med pa'i tha snyad du nges pa yin no zhes ci ste mi 'dod /
translated: Why do you not accept that the final collection is ascertained as the nature that produces the sprout, and that the thing is ascertained as the convention that is not related to the subsequent thing?

original: gzhan yang ltos pa med pa nyid kyis spyir de la nges pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang ltos pa med pa nyid kyis spyir de la nges pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: Moreover, by the very fact that it is not dependent, it is to be established in general that it is ascertained.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i dbye ba rtog pa ni ltag chod nyid de /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i dbye ba rtog pa ni ltag chod nyid de /
translated: The distinction of thing and non-thing is a mere sophistry.

original: sgra @279a * //
analyzed: sgra @279a * //
translated: Sound

original: dang bum pa 'am lus can dag lus can ma yin par rtog pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dang bum pa 'am lus can dag lus can ma yin par rtog pa bzhin no //
translated: is not a thing, like a pot, nor is it a non-thing, like a sky-flower.

original: de'i phyir 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa ni mi dmigs pa'i dbye ba nyid la de yang rang bzhin gyi khongs su 'du bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa ni mi dmigs pa'i dbye ba nyid la de yang rang bzhin gyi khongs su 'du bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the observation of pervasion by contradiction is a type of non-observation. And that is included in the essential.

original: des na gtan tshigs gnyis nyid dang / bzlog pa gnyis nyid do ;
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs gnyis nyid dang / bzlog pa gnyis nyid do ;
translated: Therefore, there are two types of reasons and two types of contradictions.

original: / des na rigs mthun pa la yod pa dang / rnam pa gnyis su gyur pa de ni gtan tshigs yin la /
analyzed: / des na rigs mthun pa la yod pa dang / rnam pa gnyis su gyur pa de ni gtan tshigs yin la /
translated: Thus, the reason is that which exists in a similar instance and has two aspects.

original: bzlog pa ni 'gal ba yin zhing de las gzhan dag ni ma nges pa rnam pa lnga yin no //
analyzed: bzlog pa ni 'gal ba yin zhing de las gzhan dag ni ma nges pa rnam pa lnga yin no //
translated: The contradiction is the opposite of that. The other five are indeterminate.

original: de la khyad par dang spyi dag go bar byed pa nyid du rtsod pa spang ba yin no //
analyzed: de la khyad par dang spyi dag go bar byed pa nyid du rtsod pa spang ba yin no //
translated: Here, the argument that a particular and a universal are the means of understanding is refuted.

original: lhag ma rnam pa gsum ni ldog pa'i sgo nas go bar byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'di ltar / gtan tshigs rjes 'gro'i sgo nas ni //
analyzed: lhag ma rnam pa gsum ni ldog pa'i sgo nas go bar byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro // 'di ltar / gtan tshigs rjes 'gro'i sgo nas ni //
translated: The remaining three are taught to be the means of understanding by way of the reverse.üîΩThus:üîΩIt is established as the means of understanding

original: go byed nyid du gnas yin te //
analyzed: go byed nyid du gnas yin te //
translated: by way of the forward pervasion.

original: yod tsam mnyam lhag rnam pa ni //
analyzed: yod tsam mnyam lhag rnam pa ni //
translated: The mere existence, equality, and excess

original: gsum ka'ang go byed nyid min phyir //
analyzed: gsum ka'ang go byed nyid min phyir //
translated: are not the means of understanding in any of the three.

original: gal te rjes su 'gro bar byed pa nyid la sbyor ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su 'gro bar byed pa nyid la sbyor ba yin na /
translated: If the reason is a property of the subject that is invariably concomitant with the probandum,

original: mi rtag pa'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba ma yin no zhes bya bar yang go bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba ma yin no zhes bya bar yang go bar 'gyur te /
translated: then it is understood that the sound is not produced by effort because it is impermanent.

original: 'di la rjes su 'gro ba ni yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di la rjes su 'gro ba ni yod pa nyid do //
translated: In this case, the reason is a property of the subject and is invariably concomitant with the probandum.

original: 'on te yod pa tsam gyis go bar byed pa ma yin te /üîΩldog pa dang lhan cig pa la ltos pa'i rjes su 'gro ba go byed yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te yod pa tsam gyis go bar byed pa ma yin te / ldog pa dang lhan cig pa la ltos pa'i rjes su 'gro ba go byed yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: But if the mere fact that the reason is a property of the subject does not make it a correct reason,üîΩthen the reason must be a property of the subject that is invariably concomitant with the probandum, in the sense that it is present when the probandum is present and absent when the probandum is absent.

original: 'o na reg par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rtag go zhes bya ba ni go byed yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na reg par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rtag go zhes bya ba ni go byed yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the reason ‚Äúbecause it is permanent‚Äù would be a correct reason for the probandum ‚Äúbecause it is tangible.‚Äù

original: 'di yang go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: But that is not a correct reason.

original: rjes su 'gro ba mnyam pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba mnyam pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the reason is not invariably concomitant with the probandum.

original: 'o na mi rtag pa'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di go byed du 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na mi rtag pa'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di go byed du 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, the reason ‚Äúbecause it is impermanent‚Äù would be a correct reason for the probandum ‚Äúbecause it is produced by effort.‚Äù

original: 'di la rjes su 'gro ba ni stobs dang ldan pa la ldog pa ni stobs chung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di la rjes su 'gro ba ni stobs dang ldan pa la ldog pa ni stobs chung ba yin no //
translated: In this case, the reason is a property of the subject and is invariably concomitant with the probandum.

original: 'di ltar / gtso bo de las gzhan pa ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gtso bo de las gzhan pa ni //
translated: Thus:

original: khyad par la ni ltos ma yin //üîΩzas sogs la ni sbyor byed pa //
analyzed: khyad par la ni ltos ma yin // zas sogs la ni sbyor byed pa //
translated: The principal is not dependent on the specific.üîΩOne does not see that the application to food, etc.

original: gzhan la ltos par ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos par ma mthong ngo //
translated: is dependent on another.

original: gal te rjes su 'gro bas go bar byed pa nyid du rab tu sbyor ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su 'gro bas go bar byed pa nyid du rab tu sbyor ba yin na /
translated: If the application is made by way of concomitance,

original: ldog pa yongs su rdzogs pa yod pa ltos par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ldog pa yongs su rdzogs pa yod pa ltos par mi 'gyur te /
translated: then the complete reverse would not be dependent,

original: de la gus pa med pa kho nar go bar byed pa nyid sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la gus pa med pa kho nar go bar byed pa nyid sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: because the application would be only to the non-concomitant,

original: zas la sbyor bar byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: zas la sbyor bar byed pa bzhin no //
translated: just as the application to food.

original: ldog pa'i sbyor bar byed pa yin na ni /
analyzed: ldog pa'i sbyor bar byed pa yin na ni /
translated: If the application is by way of the reverse,

original: rjes su 'gro ba yod pa tsam ltos par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba yod pa tsam ltos par 'gyur gyi /
translated: then the mere presence of the concomitance would be dependent,

original: mnyam pa'am lhag pa la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mnyam pa'am lhag pa la ni ma yin te /
translated: but not the equal or the greater,

original: dper na rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir mi rtag @279b go zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir mi rtag @279b go zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: just as in the case of the statement, ‚ÄúImpermanent because produced by effort.‚Äù

original: gang zhig rtsol ba las byung ba de ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang zhig rtsol ba las byung ba de ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: Whatever is produced by effort is just impermanent.

original: rtag pa nyid rnam par gcod pas go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid rnam par gcod pas go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The application is to the reverse by way of the exclusion of permanence.

original: de bzhin du gtan tshigs gzhan dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du gtan tshigs gzhan dag kyang ngo //
translated: Thus:

original: 'di ltar / gang gis de med sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gang gis de med sgrub byed pa //
translated: The proof of its nonexistence

original: rtag pa las ni ldog pa nyid //
analyzed: rtag pa las ni ldog pa nyid //
translated: is the very exclusion of permanence.

original: mi rtag pa la yod pas de //
analyzed: mi rtag pa la yod pas de //
translated: Since it exists in the impermanent,

original: yod pa 'di ni sgrub byed min //üîΩgal te mi rtag pa la mthong ba de ltar na yang rtag pa med par sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa 'di ni sgrub byed min // gal te mi rtag pa la mthong ba de ltar na yang rtag pa med par sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: this existence is not a proof.üîΩEven though it is seen in the impermanent, it is not a proof of the nonexistence of permanence.

original: rtag pa la med par mthong bas ni de med par sgrub na ni /
analyzed: rtag pa la med par mthong bas ni de med par sgrub na ni /
translated: If it were a proof of the nonexistence of permanence because it is seen to be nonexistent in permanence,

original: nges par phung po bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nges par phung po bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be necessary to engage in the same way as the four alternatives.

original: mthong ba ni de las gzhan dag tu gdon mi za bar gzhan du mi 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba ni de las gzhan dag tu gdon mi za bar gzhan du mi 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that what is seen is necessarily not different in other things.

original: gal te mthong ba'i sgo nas go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te mthong ba'i sgo nas go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: If it is understood through seeing,

original: de'i tshe mthong ba'i me nyid thams cad go bar byed par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de'i tshe mthong ba'i me nyid thams cad go bar byed par 'gyur gyi /
translated: then the very fire that is seen would be understood.

original: de las gzhan pa'i gsal ba ni rtogs pa ma yin des na de las gzhan pa'i gsal ba mthong ba na tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i gsal ba ni rtogs pa ma yin des na de las gzhan pa'i gsal ba mthong ba na tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: But the manifestation that is different from that is not understood, and therefore the seeing of the manifestation that is different from that is not a valid cognition.

original: 'on te de yang nang du bsdus pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de yang nang du bsdus pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: Or, is it included in the internal?

original: ma yin te ;
analyzed: ma yin te ;
translated: No, it is not.

original: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang bas nang du sdud par mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang bas nang du sdud par mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible to include the seen in the internal by following it.

original: gal te ldog pa yang de'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid kyi sgo nas nges pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te ldog pa yang de'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid kyi sgo nas nges pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the reverse is also not ascertained by way of following it,

original: de ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba gtsor gyur pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba gtsor gyur pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: how is it that following is not the principal?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: mthong ba ni ldog pa nges pa la dbang du gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba ni ldog pa nges pa la dbang du gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the seen is not subject to the ascertainment of the reverse.

original: mthong bas ni snang ba nyid nges par byed kyi de las gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong bas ni snang ba nyid nges par byed kyi de las gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: The seen ascertains only what is manifest, not what is other than that.

original: gzhan mthong ba ni gzhan nges pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan mthong ba ni gzhan nges pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: The seeing of one thing is not the cause of the ascertainment of another.

original: 'du byed pa las gzhan du yang nges so zhe na /
analyzed: 'du byed pa las gzhan du yang nges so zhe na /
translated: If it is ascertained as other than the compositional,

original: de ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: de ni mi rung ste /
translated: that is not correct.

original: dngos po gang gi rang bzhin ni //üîΩsnang ba las 'byung 'du byed pa //
analyzed: dngos po gang gi rang bzhin ni // snang ba las 'byung 'du byed pa //
translated: The nature of any entityüîΩis the cause of ascertainment

original: der nges pa yi rgyu yin te //
analyzed: der nges pa yi rgyu yin te //
translated: in the manifestation of the compositional,

original: de las gzhan du nges pa min //
analyzed: de las gzhan du nges pa min //
translated: but not in what is other than that.

original: gang gi tshe 'brel pa de nyid ldog pa gtsor gyur pa de'i tshe de'i sgo nas gtan tshigs gzhan sel ba'i go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'brel pa de nyid ldog pa gtsor gyur pa de'i tshe de'i sgo nas gtan tshigs gzhan sel ba'i go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: When that relation itself is the principal factor in the exclusion, then, by means of that, the inference is understood.

original: gal te mthong ba'i sgo nas 'brel pa rtogs pa ni ci ltar ldog pas 'brel pa rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mthong ba'i sgo nas 'brel pa rtogs pa ni ci ltar ldog pas 'brel pa rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If the relation is understood by perception, how can the relation be understood by the exclusion?

original: 'di yang 'tsham par brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang 'tsham par brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: This also is not a proper statement.

original: rjes 'gros 'brel pa yin na yang //üîΩldog pa gtso bor gyur nyid las //
analyzed: rjes 'gros 'brel pa yin na yang // ldog pa gtso bor gyur nyid las //
translated: Even if the relation is by concomitance,üîΩit is not transgressed

original: 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma yin te //
analyzed: 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma yin te //
translated: because of the principal factor of the exclusion.

original: sngar nyid du ni brjod zin to //
analyzed: sngar nyid du ni brjod zin to //
translated: This has already been stated earlier.

original: rjes su 'gro bas 'brel pa 'dzin na ni gsal ba de nyid la 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro bas 'brel pa 'dzin na ni gsal ba de nyid la 'gyur gyi /
translated: If the relation is grasped by concomitance, it would be in that very manifestation,

original: gsal ba gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
translated: but not in another manifestation.

original: 'di ltar de'i tshe gsal ba gzhan gyis rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i tshe gsal ba gzhan gyis rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Because at that time, the concomitance is not grasped by another manifestation.

original: 'on te @280a * //üîΩde dang yang phyis 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te @280a * // de dang yang phyis 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is argued thatüîΩit will be so later,

original: de lta yin na 'khrul par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de lta yin na 'khrul par 'gyur la /
translated: then there would be error.

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir na snga ma 'brel pa nyid yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir na snga ma 'brel pa nyid yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But because of error, the previous one is not really related.

original: gsal ba'i spyi zhes bya ba 'di ci yin /üîΩmi snang ba'i rang bzhin ni 'brel pa'am /
analyzed: gsal ba'i spyi zhes bya ba 'di ci yin / mi snang ba'i rang bzhin ni 'brel pa'am /
translated: What is this so-called ‚Äúuniversal of manifestation‚Äù?

original: gzhan du rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to understand a relation or something else as having the nature of non-manifestation.

original: gsal ba rnams la mtshungs par rtogs par rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan no zhe na /
analyzed: gsal ba rnams la mtshungs par rtogs par rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan no zhe na /
translated: The reason for the understanding of the similarity of manifestations is that

original: mtshungs so snyam pa'i rtogs pa ni yod mod kyi de'i tshe rgyu mtshan 'di lta bu zhig yin no zhes ni bstan par mi nus so //
analyzed: mtshungs so snyam pa'i rtogs pa ni yod mod kyi de'i tshe rgyu mtshan 'di lta bu zhig yin no zhes ni bstan par mi nus so //
translated: there is indeed the understanding that they are similar, but it is not possible to demonstrate that the reason is just this.

original: gal te mngon sum gyis ma rtogs su chug kyang 'bras bu mthong ba las rjes su dpag pas rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum gyis ma rtogs su chug kyang 'bras bu mthong ba las rjes su dpag pas rtogs so zhe na /
translated: Even if it is not understood by perception, it is understood by inference from seeing the effect.

original: rgyu'i spyi rtogs par 'gyur gyi de spyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu'i spyi rtogs par 'gyur gyi de spyi ni ma yin te /
translated: The universal of the cause is understood, but it is not that universal,

original: 'di lta bu zhes bya ba rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di lta bu zhes bya ba rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no understanding of ‚Äúsuch and such.‚Äù

original: rgyu mtshan yang 'bras bu gcig byed pa nyid yin pas gzhan ci dgos /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan yang 'bras bu gcig byed pa nyid yin pas gzhan ci dgos /
translated: And since the reason is just the production of a single effect, what else is needed?

original: 'di ltar / bya ba 'di la bdag cag rnams dbye ba yang med do zhes /
analyzed: 'di ltar / bya ba 'di la bdag cag rnams dbye ba yang med do zhes /
translated: we are not divided on this point.

original: 'di la 'jig rten mtha' dag ni //
analyzed: 'di la 'jig rten mtha' dag ni //
translated: In this regard, the entire world

original: bdag gcig du ni gnas ma yin //
analyzed: bdag gcig du ni gnas ma yin //
translated: does not abide in a single self.

original: de'i phyir du ba 'di ni sgrub par byed pa'i khyad par rnams gcig 'ga' zhig med na mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di med pa las du ba ldog pa yin no zhes gzhan sel ba nyid kyi sgo nas 'brel pa bzung pa'i phyir sgra dang rtags kyis ni ldogüîΩpa nyid bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir du ba 'di ni sgrub par byed pa'i khyad par rnams gcig 'ga' zhig med na mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di med pa las du ba ldog pa yin no zhes gzhan sel ba nyid kyi sgo nas 'brel pa bzung pa'i phyir sgra dang rtags kyis ni ldog pa nyid bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since this smoke is not produced without some particular thing, it is the absence of that which is the cause of the cessation of smoke. Thus, by the method of exclusion, the connection is grasped. Therefore, by the word and the reason, cessation is established.

original: des na ldog pa nyid gtsor rtogs pa yin la med na mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis na gsal ba'i yod pa ni shugs kyis rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na ldog pa nyid gtsor rtogs pa yin la med na mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis na gsal ba'i yod pa ni shugs kyis rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, cessation itself is primarily understood, and by the absence of non-existence, the existence of the manifestation is understood by implication.

original: me med pa med na gdon mi za bar me'i gsal ba 'ga' zhig 'phen pa yin te /
analyzed: me med pa med na gdon mi za bar me'i gsal ba 'ga' zhig 'phen pa yin te /
translated: If there is no absence of fire, then without doubt some manifestation of fire is implied.

original: de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na /
translated: If it were not so,

original: me ma yin la ldog pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me ma yin la ldog pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would not be the case that the absence of fire is the cessation of fire.

original: gal te gzhan pa dag ni ma nges pa zhes nges pa rnam pa lngar bshad pa ma yin pa 'di ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te gzhan pa dag ni ma nges pa zhes nges pa rnam pa lngar bshad pa ma yin pa 'di ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: If you say: ‚ÄúIt is not correct to explain the other as indefinite, because the five types of definite reason are not explained.

original: lhag ma dang ldan pa dang 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa yang ma nges pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: lhag ma dang ldan pa dang 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa yang ma nges pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the remaining ones that possess a remainder and the nonerroneous contradictory reason are also other indefinite reasons.‚Äù

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: bsam pa ma shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam pa ma shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because you do not understand the intention.

original: gzhan rnam pa lnga ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang /
analyzed: gzhan rnam pa lnga ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang /
translated: The meaning of the other five types of indefinite reasons is not that, but rather:

original: de la rigs mthun la yod dang // rnam gnyis de med la med par nges pa gang yin pa de ni gtan tshigs yin zhing zlog par nges pa ni de ni 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de la rigs mthun la yod dang // rnam gnyis de med la med par nges pa gang yin pa de ni gtan tshigs yin zhing zlog par nges pa ni de ni 'gal ba yin no //
translated: That which is ascertained to exist in a similar type and to not exist in a dissimilar type is a reason. That which is ascertained to be reversed is contradictory.

original: de yang thabs de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba 'brel pa sha stag go //
analyzed: de yang thabs de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba 'brel pa sha stag go //
translated: Moreover, it is only a related reason that is either of the same or of a different nature.

original: gzhan dag ni ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni ma nges pa yin te /
translated: The others are indefinite.

original: @280b de ltar 'brel ba ma yin pa ni ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba dag gi don go //
analyzed: @280b de ltar 'brel ba ma yin pa ni ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba dag gi don go //
translated: The meaning of those is that that which is not related is indefinite.

original: lhag ma dang ldan pa dang 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can yang mtshan nyid 'di nyid yin pa'i phyir de gnyis kyang ma nges pa ma bzlog go //
analyzed: lhag ma dang ldan pa dang 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can yang mtshan nyid 'di nyid yin pa'i phyir de gnyis kyang ma nges pa ma bzlog go //
translated: The remaining two, the inconclusive and the contradictory, are also not excluded from the uncertain because they have the same characteristic.

original: des na thams cad kha na ma tho ba med do //
analyzed: des na thams cad kha na ma tho ba med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault in all of them.

original: 'di ltar / 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can gyi yul phrogs pa ni bsgrub par bya ba la 'brel pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can gyi yul phrogs pa ni bsgrub par bya ba la 'brel pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Thus, the object of the contradictory and the inconclusive is not related to the probandum.

original: 'on ci ltar mi 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on ci ltar mi 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: But how can it be inconclusive?

original: 'brel pa yang ma yin la mi 'khrul pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gal lo zhe na /
analyzed: 'brel pa yang ma yin la mi 'khrul pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gal lo zhe na /
translated: It is contradictory to say that it is not related and it is inconclusive.

original: de lta na yang 'o na 'khrul pa yang yin la the tshom gyi rgyu yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di la yang 'gal ba nyid do //
analyzed: de lta na yang 'o na 'khrul pa yang yin la the tshom gyi rgyu yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di la yang 'gal ba nyid do //
translated: Even so, it is contradictory to say that it is inconclusive and it is a cause of doubt.

original: nged kyi phyogs ltar na ni ma 'brel pa nyid kyis the tshom gyi rgyu yin no //
analyzed: nged kyi phyogs ltar na ni ma 'brel pa nyid kyis the tshom gyi rgyu yin no //
translated: But according to our position, it is a cause of doubt because it is not related.

original: mi 'khrul pa nyid ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: mi 'khrul pa nyid ci ltar zhe na /
translated: But how can it be inconclusive?

original: khas blangs pa'i sgo nas yin pas skyon med do //
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i sgo nas yin pas skyon med do //
translated: Since it is inconclusive by way of assertion, there is no fault.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'o na gang gi tshe sgra nyid rtag par khas blangs pa de'i tshe 'di gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes smras pa yin te /
analyzed: 'o na gang gi tshe sgra nyid rtag par khas blangs pa de'i tshe 'di gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes smras pa yin te /
translated: But when sound itself is accepted as permanent, then it would be a logical reason.üîΩThus, it is said:

original: 'di ltar / gang yang mnyan par bya ba nyid //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gang yang mnyan par bya ba nyid //
translated: ‚ÄúThat which is to be heard

original: 'jig pa nyid du mthong ba med //
analyzed: 'jig pa nyid du mthong ba med //
translated: is not seen to be destroyed.

original: rtag pa nyid la mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid la mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it is seen to be permanent,

original: go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur //
translated: it would be a logical reason.‚Äù

original: go bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: go bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Because it is accepted as having the characteristic of a logical reason, it is a logical reason.

original: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba tsam gyis kyang bye brag pa'i go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin la ;
analyzed: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba tsam gyis kyang bye brag pa'i go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin la ;
translated: Even by mere seeing and not seeing, it is a logical reason that makes one understand for the Vai≈õe·π£ika.

original: de ni 'di la yang yod pas go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ni 'di la yang yod pas go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: And since that exists here as well, it would be a logical reason.

original: slob dpon gyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis gsungs pa /
translated: The master says:

original: gal te 'dir 'ga' zhig byas pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs su mi brjod na go bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'dir 'ga' zhig byas pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs su mi brjod na go bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If here someone does not state that being produced is a logical reason for impermanence, it would be a logical reason.

original: gnyi ga yang go bar byed pa nyid du brten na ni rang gis khas blangs pa nyid las the tshom du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang go bar byed pa nyid du brten na ni rang gis khas blangs pa nyid las the tshom du 'gyur ro //
translated: If both were established as the means of understanding, then there would be doubt, because of the very fact that one accepts both.

original: de'i phyir khas len pa'i bye brag nyid shin tu dogs par chud pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir khas len pa'i bye brag nyid shin tu dogs par chud pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the difference in the assertion itself is completely lost.

original: 'di ltar / gal te sgra mi rtag par ni //üîΩ'dod ni sgra nyid rtag par der //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te sgra mi rtag par ni // 'dod ni sgra nyid rtag par der //
translated: Thus, if one asserts that sound is impermanent,üîΩthen sound itself is permanent in that context.

original: de yi sgo nas gtan tshigs nyid //
analyzed: de yi sgo nas gtan tshigs nyid //
translated: If that is the means of inferring,

original: yin na gzhan yang go byed 'gyur //
analyzed: yin na gzhan yang go byed 'gyur //
translated: then something else would also be understood.

original: rigs pa mtshungs pa can de ltar mi 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: rigs pa mtshungs pa can de ltar mi 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: That is not so, because of the similarity of the reasoning.

original: de lta na ni /
analyzed: de lta na ni /
translated: If it were so,

original: 'di rigs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rigs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then that would not be reasonable.

original: de lta yin dang tha snyad mtha' dag chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin dang tha snyad mtha' dag chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were the case, then all conventions would be cut off.

original: mnyan bya nyid kyang byas pa dang gtan tshigs kyi rigs mtshungs pa yin te des na byas pa nyid 'di @281a * //
analyzed: mnyan bya nyid kyang byas pa dang gtan tshigs kyi rigs mtshungs pa yin te des na byas pa nyid 'di @281a * //
translated: The state of being audible is similar in type to being produced. Therefore, this being produced

original: yang bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa 'khrul pa med pa can yin pas /
analyzed: yang bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa 'khrul pa med pa can yin pas /
translated: is not mistaken in the opposite of the probandum.

original: ci ltar go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir gzhan gyis khas blangs pas 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes slob dpon gyi dgongs pa rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: ci ltar go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir gzhan gyis khas blangs pas 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes slob dpon gyi dgongs pa rtogs par bya ste /
translated: Since it is not a means of understanding, therefore, the contradiction of what is accepted by the other party is nonerroneous, but not otherwise. This should be understood to be the thought of the master.

original: 'o na gang gi tshe sgra nyid rtag par khas len pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na gang gi tshe sgra nyid rtag par khas len pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But when it is said, ‚ÄúWhen one accepts that sound itself is permanent,‚Äù then what?

original: de'i phyir ma 'brel pa nyid the tshom gyi rgyu yin pas gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid khyab pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma 'brel pa nyid the tshom gyi rgyu yin pas gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid khyab pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, since irrelevance itself is a cause of doubt, the definition of a reason, etc., is pervasion.

original: de la phyogs kyi chos gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya bas shugs phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa ni gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: de la phyogs kyi chos gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya bas shugs phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa ni gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: In that regard, the statement, ‚ÄúThe property of the subject is the reason,‚Äù implies that that which is not the property of the subject is not the reason.

original: phyogs kyi chos phyin ci log 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos phyin ci log 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: This is because the property of the subject is the opposite of the contradictory.

original: phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa'i ni 'gal ba ma yin no phyogs kyi chos gzhan ni ma nges pa yin no zhes bya bas phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa ni ma nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa'i ni 'gal ba ma yin no phyogs kyi chos gzhan ni ma nges pa yin no zhes bya bas phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa ni ma nges pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not the property of the subject, the non-property of the subject is not contradictory. The other property of the subject is uncertain. Thus, the non-property of the subject is not uncertain.

original: des na ma grub pa zhes rang gi ming gis bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na ma grub pa zhes rang gi ming gis bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is to be shown by its own name as unestablished.

original: chos can grub pa yang ma grub pa nyid la gang la yang rung ba la ma grub pa yang ngo //
analyzed: chos can grub pa yang ma grub pa nyid la gang la yang rung ba la ma grub pa yang ngo //
translated: The established subject is also unestablished, and the unestablished is also any.

original: de skad du yang slob dpon gyis //üîΩgnyi ga la ni grub chos kyis //
analyzed: de skad du yang slob dpon gyis // gnyi ga la ni grub chos kyis //
translated: Thus, the master [DignƒÅga] said:

original: tha snyad byed phyir zlog pa'am //
analyzed: tha snyad byed phyir zlog pa'am //
translated: Because a convention is made with a property of the subject that is established for both,üîΩit is refuted.üîΩIf one of the two is unestablished,

original: gnyis las gcig la ma grub dang // chos can ma grub na mi 'dod //üîΩci'o // gal te phyogs kyi chos gtan tshigs yin na 'o na /
analyzed: gnyis las gcig la ma grub dang // chos can ma grub na mi 'dod // ci'o // gal te phyogs kyi chos gtan tshigs yin na 'o na /
translated: and the subject is unestablished, it is not accepted.

original: ci ltar sgra ni mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: ci ltar sgra ni mi rtag pa ste /
translated: If the property of the subject is the reason, then how is it that sound is impermanent?

original: byas pa mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir dang / rtag pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du ni //
analyzed: byas pa mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir dang / rtag pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du ni //
translated: Because that which is created is impermanent and that which is permanent is not created.üîΩAnd similarly,

original: 'bras bu ni snga na yod pa ma yin te med pa mi byed phyir dang / nye bar len pa len pa'i phyir dang / thams cad las 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / nus par byed pa nus pa'i phyir dang / rgyu'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni snga na yod pa ma yin te med pa mi byed phyir dang / nye bar len pa len pa'i phyir dang / thams cad las 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / nus par byed pa nus pa'i phyir dang / rgyu'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: the effect does not exist prior to the cause because that which does not exist does not create, because appropriation is taken up, because it does not arise from everything, because it is the capacity of that which is capable, and because it is the nature of the cause.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: gang du gtan tshigs bsgrub bya yi //
analyzed: gang du gtan tshigs bsgrub bya yi //
translated: Where the reason is establishedüîΩby the forward or reverse pervasion,

original: rjes 'gro 'am med na med pa dag / lnga pas brjod der dpe yin te //üîΩgtan tshigs nyer gtong bdag nyid las //
analyzed: rjes 'gro 'am med na med pa dag / lnga pas brjod der dpe yin te // gtan tshigs nyer gtong bdag nyid las //
translated: the fifth is stated as the example.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag ste byas pa @281b mi rtag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag ste byas pa @281b mi rtag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For example, sound is impermanent because it is created.

original: de bzhin du sgra yang byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra yang byas pa yin no //
translated: Sound is also created.

original: sgra ni mi rtag ste rtag pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra ni mi rtag ste rtag pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Sound is impermanent because that which is permanent is not created.

original: sgra ni ma byas pa yin no zhes 'dir lnga pas ni chos mthun pa dang mi mthun pa dag gis dpe bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don ni de kho na dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni ma byas pa yin no zhes 'dir lnga pas ni chos mthun pa dang mi mthun pa dag gis dpe bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don ni de kho na dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement.

original: de bzhin du med pa mi byed pa la sogs pa la yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du med pa mi byed pa la sogs pa la yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: The same should be understood in the case of non-existence not producing, etc.

original: ji ltar 'di dag gtan tshigs ma yin pa de ltar ni bstan zin to //
analyzed: ji ltar 'di dag gtan tshigs ma yin pa de ltar ni bstan zin to //
translated: We have already shown how these are not reasons.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / 'brel pa ma grub gtan tshigs ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang / 'brel pa ma grub gtan tshigs ni //
translated: A reason whose relation is not established

original: bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa la //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa la //
translated: cannot prove the probandum.

original: nus med 'di la de med pa //
analyzed: nus med 'di la de med pa //
translated: Since this is not possible,

original: des na 'di dag gtan tshigs min //
analyzed: des na 'di dag gtan tshigs min //
translated: these are not reasons.

original: med pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar gtan tshigs ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: med pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar gtan tshigs ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that ‚Äúbecause non-existence does not produce‚Äù is not a reason?

original: med pa ri bong gi rva la sogs pa byed pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin na 'di tsam ldog pas ni bzlog pa grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa ri bong gi rva la sogs pa byed pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin na 'di tsam ldog pas ni bzlog pa grub pa ma yin no //
translated: If it is because ‚Äúwe do not see the production of non-existent things, such as the horns of an ass,‚Äù then this mere reversal does not establish the opposite.

original: gal te med pa 'ga' zhig la byed pa mi dmigs pa de ltar na yang thams cad de ltar yin no zhes bya ba'i bya ba pa ni ga las yin bzlog pa'i 'brel pa med par ni ldog pa'i khyab pa 'grub pa ma yin no //üîΩdu ba med pas me med la //
analyzed: gal te med pa 'ga' zhig la byed pa mi dmigs pa de ltar na yang thams cad de ltar yin no zhes bya ba'i bya ba pa ni ga las yin bzlog pa'i 'brel pa med par ni ldog pa'i khyab pa 'grub pa ma yin no // du ba med pas me med la //
translated: If you say that the non-perception of activity in regard to some non-existent is like that, then how can you be sure that it is so in all cases? The pervasion of the reverse is not established without a relation of the reverse.

original: khyab pa ji ltar grub ce na //üîΩme yis du la khyab par ni //
analyzed: khyab pa ji ltar grub ce na // me yis du la khyab par ni //
translated: How is the pervasion of the absence of fire by the absence of smoke established?

original: gal te tshad mas grub gyur na'o //
analyzed: gal te tshad mas grub gyur na'o //
translated: If the pervasion of smoke by fire were established by a means of valid knowledge,üîΩthen it would be possible to understand the pervasion of the reverse by the mere force of that.

original: 'gro ba mtha' dag tu bskor kyang de dang gzhan na yang med do zhes ldog pa'i khyab pa rtogs par nus pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gro ba mtha' dag tu bskor kyang de dang gzhan na yang med do zhes ldog pa'i khyab pa rtogs par nus pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Even if one were to search everywhere in all the worlds, one would not find it anywhere else.

original: yul dus khyab par mtha' dag bskor ba nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dus khyab par mtha' dag bskor ba nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible to search everywhere in all places and times.

original: rjes su 'gro bas 'brel pa 'dzin na ni //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro bas 'brel pa 'dzin na ni //
translated: If the relation is grasped by positive concomitance,

original: de'i shugs nyid kyis ldog pa'i khyab pa rab tu 'grub po //
analyzed: de'i shugs nyid kyis ldog pa'i khyab pa rab tu 'grub po //
translated: then the pervasion of the reverse is established by the mere force of that.

original: 'di yang sngar bstan zin pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di yang sngar bstan zin pa nyid do //
translated: This has already been explained before.

original: de'i phyir 'di dag ni gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dag ni gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, these are not reasons.

original: de'i phyir 'di dag ni gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dag ni gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, these are not reasons.

original: de'i phyogs kyi chos nyid gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba dang ma nges par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyogs kyi chos nyid gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba dang ma nges par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The property of the position is contradictory to the reason and is not ascertained.

original: des ni yod pa dang med pa rab tu bstan pa'i tshul gyis gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid gsal bar byas pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni yod pa dang med pa rab tu bstan pa'i tshul gyis gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid gsal bar byas pa yin no //
translated: By this, he has clarified inference for the sake of others by the method of teaching existence and non-existence.

original: tshul gsum la lhag ma lus pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir spros la /
analyzed: tshul gsum la lhag ma lus pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir spros la /
translated: In order to understand the remaining three modes, he elaborates.

original: lhag ma dag ni tshad ma kun las btus pa nyid las phyogs par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: lhag ma dag ni tshad ma kun las btus pa nyid las phyogs par bya ba yin te /
translated: The remaining [modes] should be understood from the PramaÃÑnasanÃágraha itself.

original: des na rnam 'grel mdzad pas thugs btang snyoms su mdzad do //
analyzed: des na rnam 'grel mdzad pas thugs btang snyoms su mdzad do //
translated: Therefore, the author of the PramaÃÑnÔ¨Å avaÃÑrtika has set them aside.

original: kyi yi rtsod rnams rtag tu phyogs lhung bas //
analyzed: kyi yi rtsod rnams rtag tu phyogs lhung bas //
translated: The disputants are always biased.

original: sngar yid rang bzhin phyogs byas nus pa ni //üîΩde nyid rtogs pa sgrub min yid kyi tshul //
analyzed: sngar yid rang bzhin phyogs byas nus pa ni // de nyid rtogs pa sgrub min yid kyi tshul //
translated: Having previously taken a position, they are unableüîΩTo establish the truth.üîΩThe Madhyamika, who is impartial, establishes the truth

original: dbu mar gnas pas yid phyir de blo bsgrubs //
analyzed: dbu mar gnas pas yid phyir de blo bsgrubs //
translated: By means of the mind.

original: gzhung lugs pa rnams chos @282a * //
analyzed: gzhung lugs pa rnams chos @282a * //
translated: The philosophers are attached to their own doctrines.

original: kyi grags dpal bzhed pa dri med de 'dra nyid kyis rtogs bya 'di //
analyzed: kyi grags dpal bzhed pa dri med de 'dra nyid kyis rtogs bya 'di //
translated: The stainless assertions of the glorious Dharmakƒ´rti are just like that.

original: bdag 'dras bshad la ji ltar dbang zhes 'di la yun rings rgyu bsams na //üîΩ'dir goms cam gyis gal te gzhan 'dir de nyid don grub bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag 'dras bshad la ji ltar dbang zhes 'di la yun rings rgyu bsams na // 'dir goms cam gyis gal te gzhan 'dir de nyid don grub bya ba'i phyir //
translated: Having thought for a long time about how someone like me can explain this,üîΩI have composed this for the sake of accomplishing the meaning of reality here,

original: bdag dang gzhan lugs rigs dang rigs min don 'dir byas 'gyur 'dir cher rigs //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan lugs rigs dang rigs min don 'dir byas 'gyur 'dir cher rigs //
translated: even if it is just through becoming familiar with it here.

original: 'dir legs rab mang brjod par nus mod kyi //
analyzed: 'dir legs rab mang brjod par nus mod kyi //
translated: Here, I could express many good things,

original: gzhan rtogs grub phyir mdor bsdus nas 'di byas //
analyzed: gzhan rtogs grub phyir mdor bsdus nas 'di byas //
translated: but I have composed this in brief for the sake of understanding something else.

original: rin chen 'byung gnas nas rnyed rin chen tshogs //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung gnas nas rnyed rin chen tshogs //
translated: The collection of jewels found by RatnƒÅkara

original: len byed mkhas pa med mod de med min //üîΩchags phyir grong pa mdzes pa yi //
analyzed: len byed mkhas pa med mod de med min // chags phyir grong pa mdzes pa yi //
translated: is not nonexistent, even though there are no wise ones to take it.üîΩJust as one who wishes to adorn the body

original: rgyan gyis lus ni brgyan 'dod ltar //
analyzed: rgyan gyis lus ni brgyan 'dod ltar //
translated: with ornaments adorns the beautiful town out of attachment,

original: rnam 'grel rgyan yang bdag gis ni //
analyzed: rnam 'grel rgyan yang bdag gis ni //
translated: I have also composed this Ornament of the Middle Way

original: byas te dregs pa'i phyir ma yin //
analyzed: byas te dregs pa'i phyir ma yin //
translated: but not out of pride.

original: de ltar sems de rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos tshul zhib po rtogs byed pa //
analyzed: de ltar sems de rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos tshul zhib po rtogs byed pa //
translated: Thus, the mind always realizes the subtle way of the Dharma of the TathƒÅgatas.

original: gzhan don bsgrub brtson blo can rnams kyi blo gros 'di ni legs pa'i don du 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: gzhan don bsgrub brtson blo can rnams kyi blo gros 'di ni legs pa'i don du 'gyur ba ste //
translated: The intellect of those who strive to accomplish the aims of others is well directed toward the good.

original: 'gro ba mtha' dag dga' byed dpal dang me dang zla ba bskyed pa'i ma //
analyzed: 'gro ba mtha' dag dga' byed dpal dang me dang zla ba bskyed pa'i ma //
translated: It is the source of the glory, the fire, and the moon that delight the whole world.

original: gang chen las gzhan rgya mtsho 'ang 'gro na 'gar yang mthong ba yod dam ci //
analyzed: gang chen las gzhan rgya mtsho 'ang 'gro na 'gar yang mthong ba yod dam ci //
translated: Is there anywhere in the world a sea that is greater than the great ocean?

original: de ltar bdag gis smad med 'di sbyar bas //
analyzed: de ltar bdag gis smad med 'di sbyar bas //
translated: Thus, I have composed this unblemished work.

original: dge ba dri med thob pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: dge ba dri med thob pa gang yin pa //
translated: Whatever stainless virtue I have gained

original: des ni 'gro ba kun gyi don grub par //
analyzed: des ni 'gro ba kun gyi don grub par //
translated: by this, may it bring about the success of the aims of all beingsüîΩand may all beings always be successful.

original: 'gro ba 'di ni rtag tu grub gyur cig / tshad ma'i bshad pa chen po rnam 'grel gyi rgyan las le'u bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di ni rtag tu grub gyur cig / tshad ma'i bshad pa chen po rnam 'grel gyi rgyan las le'u bzhi pa'o /
translated: This concludes the fourth chapter of the Great Explanation of Valid Knowledge, the Ornament of the Middle Way.

original: // / tshad ma'i bshad pa chen po rnam 'grel gyi rgyan slob dpon mkhas pa chen po shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pa'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: // / tshad ma'i bshad pa chen po rnam 'grel gyi rgyan slob dpon mkhas pa chen po shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pa'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The Great Explanation of Valid Knowledge, the Ornament of the Middle Way, composed by the great scholar and master Praj√±ƒÅkaragupta, is complete.

original: // / bam po drug cu lhag chad med par yod do //
analyzed: // / bam po drug cu lhag chad med par yod do //
translated: It exists without any missing or extra folios.

original: kha che'i mkhan po pandi ta skal ldan rgyal po dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur /
analyzed: kha che'i mkhan po pandi ta skal ldan rgyal po dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur /
translated: Translated by the Kashmiri abbot Pandit Bhavyaraja and the translator-monk Sherab Lodro.

original: slad kyis kha che'i mkhan po pandi ta ku m'a ra shra'i dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyis zhus shing bcos te gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: slad kyis kha che'i mkhan po pandi ta ku m'a ra shra'i dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyis zhus shing bcos te gtan la phab pa /
translated: Later, it was revised and finalized by the Kashmiri abbot Pandit Kumarashri and the great editor, the monk-translator Pal Sherab.
